    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AppointmentListSingleton getInstance()
        Method to get the instance of the singleton to prevent from creating multiple instances.
        Returns:
        Returns instance of existing appointment list singleton

      • addRequest

        public void addRequest(Patient patient,
                       java.util.Date date,
                       Doctor doctor,
                       java.lang.String time)
        Adds the appointment with REQUEST state to the appointment list.
        Parameters:
        patient - Patient account instance that has requested the appointment
        date - Requested date of the appointment
        doctor - Doctor account instance assigned to the appointment
        time - Requested time of the appointment

      • getStateList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getStateList(Appointment.AppointmentState state)
        Gets the appointment list that have a provided state.
        Parameters:
        state - State of the appointment (REQUEST, APPROVED, ARCHIVED)
        Returns:
        List of the appointments with a given state

      • approveRequest

        public void approveRequest(int appointmentId)
        Approves the appointment request, consequently changing its state to APPROVED.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - ID number of the appointment to approve

      • removeRequest

        public void removeRequest(int appointmentId)
        Removes the appointment request from the list.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - ID number of the appointment to remove

      • addAppointment

        public void addAppointment(Doctor doctor,
                           Patient patient,
                           java.util.Date date,
                           java.lang.String time)
        Adds the appointment with APPROVED state to the appointment list.
        Parameters:
        doctor - Doctor account instance assigned to the appointment
        patient - Patient account instance assigned to the appointment
        date - Scheduled date of the appointment
        time - Scheduled time of the appointment

      • getPatientHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getPatientHistory(Patient patient)
        Gets the appointments with ARCHIVED state assigned to a specific patient.
        Parameters:
        patient - Patient account instance that the appointments are assigned to
        Returns:
        Complete list of appointments that have taken place involving specified patient

      • getScheduledAppointments

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments(Doctor doctor)
        Gets the list of the scheduled appointments for a specific doctor.
        Parameters:
        doctor - Doctor account instance that the appointments are assigned to
        Returns:
        Complete list of upcoming appointments assigned to the specified doctor

      • completeAppointment

        public void completeAppointment(Appointment appointment)
        Completes the appointment, setting its state to ARCHIVED.
        Parameters:
        appointment - Appointment instance to complete

      • getAppointment

        Gets the appointment with given ID number
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - ID number of the appointment
        Returns:
        Appointment instance with ID number provided in parameter
